title: The Silent Thaw
description: When the ThunderClan leader, Bramblestar, starts to behave oddly after losing one of his nine lives, suspicion quickly spreads across Clan borders. And after a strange apparition causes unrest in SkyClan and ShadowClan, each warrior must decide where their allegiances lieâ€”with their Clan, or the warrior code itself.
author: Erin Hunter
